title: [Stock Info] $HITIF - Raj Grover to speak on managing the rapid expansion to 80+ stores and expansion

[DD] $NLST Netlist and SK hynix, and the parties have agreed to collaborate! Netlist will receive a payment of $40,000,000 in connection with the entry into the License Agreement. The Supply Agreement entitles Netlist to purchase up to $600,000,000 of SK hynix memory products!
